name: Taiwan OpenCourseWare Consortium
description:
Taiwan OpenCourseWare Consortium (TOCWC) promotes OpenCourseWare (OCW) under the principles of openness, sharing, co-building, and common achievement. 
Taiwan OpenCourseWare Consortium (TOCWC) consisted of 13 Taiwan lead universities with non-profit organization since December of year 2008. After its inception, TOCWC aims to expand OpenCourseWare to all fields of studies. TOCWC will eventually extend out of university walls and break the barriers to knowledge exchange. We will provide the global Chinese community diverse and rich learning resources, creating an environment for life-long learning.
